summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2001 FORD F350.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE DRIVER SIDE SEAT BELT LATCH WOULD UNLATCH BY ITSELF.  THE VEHICLE WAS INSPECTED FOR NHTSA RECALL NUMBER 01V227001 (SEAT BELT), BUT THE DEALER DID NOT PERFORM ANY REPAIRS.  THE MANUFACTURER REFUSED TO REPLACE THE BUCKLE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 75,000 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 10,000.    UPDATED 02-01-08 *BF    UPDATED 02/01/08  *TR
